resources.string:
-Privacy Policy
This application saves notifications that come to your phone. We value your privacy and adhere to high standards of data protection.
-Collected data
The application collects only notifications that come to your phone. They are stored in the local storage of your device and are not transferred to any third parties.
-Data usage
Unsaved notifications are used only inside the app to provide you with the functionality to view and manage them.
-Data Storage
Notifications are stored on your device in local storage and can only be deleted by you through the application interface.
-Contacts
If you have any questions or comments regarding our privacy policy, please contact us at akbar20sharipov01@gmail.com
